record1.<1>:
$insert logical
$insert ps_equates
$insert sysrepos_col_equates
$insert repository_equates

equ TITLE$            to "Entity Properties ["
equ SOURCEPOINTER$    to "Is a pointer to entity %1% in application %2%."
equ SOURCEINHERITED$  to "Is inherited from application %1%."
equ SOURCELOCAL$      to "Resides in this application."
equ UPDATESTRING$     to "user %1% on %2%."

declare subroutine Utility

/*====================================================================== */
ctlEdit  = Get_Property(@window : ".NOTES", "ORIG_STRUCT")
ctlStyle = ctlEdit<1, PSPOS_SDKSTYLE$>
	
ctlStyle = iconv(ctlStyle[3, 99], 'MX') + (8 * 256)
ctlEdit<1, PSPOS_SDKSTYLE$> = ctlStyle
	
Utility('DESTROY', @window : ".NOTES")
Utility('CREATE', ctlEdit)
	
EntId = Field(CreateParam, @RM, 1)
EntBody = Field(CreateParam, @RM , 2)
	
If EntBody = "" then
	return 1
end
	
titleText = TITLE$ : entId : "]"
    
/* put the entity id in the title bar */
statx = set_property( @window, "TEXT", titleText )
    
/* load the single line description (title) into the TITLE control */
.title->Text = entBody< SYSREP_TITLE$ >
    
/* formulate a textual description of the source */
if len( entBody< SYSREP_POINTER_APPID$ > ) then
	/* is a pointer to an entity in above */
	sourceApp = entBody< SYSREP_POINTER_APPID$ >
	pointEnt = entBody< SYSREP_POINTER_ENTITYID$ >

	sourceString = SOURCEPOINTER$
	swap "%1%" with pointEnt in sourceString
	swap "%2%" with sourceApp in sourceString        
    
end else
	/* the entity is not a pointer */
	if Field( EntID, '*', 1 ) <> @appid<1> then
		/* entity is inherited */
		sourceString = SOURCEINHERITED$
		swap "%1%" with Field( EntID, '*', 1 ) in sourceString
	end else
		/* the entity is a local */
		sourceString = SOURCELOCAL$
	end
end
    
.Source->Text = sourceString
    
.Author->Text = entBody< SYSREP_AUTHOR$ >
    
subKeyString = entBody< SYSREP_SUB_KEY$ > 
convert @vm:@svm:@tm to ";,-" in subKeyString
.Subkey->Text = subKeyString
    
.Publishable->Check = entBody< SYSREP_PUBLISHABLE$ >
.Shareable->Check = entBody< SYSREP_SHAREABLE$ >
.Evaluate->Check = entBody< SYSREP_EVALUATE$ >
.Recompile->Check = entBody< SYSREP_RECOMPILE$ >
.Checkout->Check = entBody< SYSREP_CHECKOUT$ >
        
updateUser = entBody< SYSREP_UPDATED_BY$ >
updateTimeDate = oconv( entBody< SYSREP_UPDATED$ >, 'DT' )
    
updateString = UPDATESTRING$
swap "%1%" with updateUser in updateString
swap "%2%" with updateTimeDate in updateString
    
.Update->Text = updateString
        
.Notes->Text = entBody< SYSREP_DESCRIPTION$ >

@@window->Visible = TRUE$

return TRUE$
